channel.title: Client Freeze's when logging in or teleporting. Rep ++
channel.description:
Sometimes I can teleport without being freezed or frozen w/e you wana call it, but the past couple times when i log in it freezes and the first time it happened was when i teleported. heres the error and theres also a video to show you an exmaple: [code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 20520 at EntityDef.forID(EntityDef.java:17) at client.method46(client.java:3561) at client.updateNPCs(client.java:1915) at client.parsePacket(client.java:14869) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:4363) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:3585) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:155) at client.run(client.java:6463) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) Error: max Too many npcs java.lang.RuntimeException: eek at client.method139(client.java:13436) at client.updateNPCs(client.java:1914) at client.parsePacket(client.java:14869) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:4363) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:3585) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:155) at client.run(client.java:6463) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) Error: max Too many npcs java.lang.RuntimeException: eek at client.method139(client.java:13436) item.title: Client Freeze's when logging in or teleporting. Rep ++
item.dc:creator: @97_emerald 97 emerald
item.description:
@97_emerald wrote:

dont delete all the npcs just delete a few and try again that should fix it

Read full topic
